com.att.aro.model

Class ApplicationSelection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.att.aro.model.ApplicationSelection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ApplicationSelection
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Contains methods for managing the settings applied to each Application listed in the Select Applications/IPs dialog.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      ApplicationSelection(ApplicationSelection app)
      Initializes an instance of the ApplicationSelection class, using another instance of the ApplicationSelection class.

      Initializes an instance of the ApplicationSelection class, using the specified application name, and collection of IP addresses.

      • isSelected

        public boolean isSelected()
        Retrieves the selection status of the application.
        Returns:
        A boolean value that is true if this application is selected, and false otherwise.

      • setSelected

        public void setSelected(boolean selected)
        Registers the specifed selected status with the local selected status for this application.
        Parameters:
        selected - A boolean value that indicates the selected status to set for this application.

      • getIPAddressSelection

        public IPAddressSelection getIPAddressSelection(java.net.InetAddress ip)
        Returns the IPAddressSelection object containing selection settings for the specified IP address.
        Parameters:
        ip - The IP address
        Returns:
        The IPAddressSelection objector null if the IP address is not found.

      • getIPAddressSelections

        public java.util.Collection<IPAddressSelection> getIPAddressSelections()
        Returns all of the IP address selections for this application.
        Returns:
